Package rubank

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • rubank.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    The Date class represents a date with year, month, and day. Provides methods to validate the date, check if it is a leap year, check if the date is in the future, and check if the date represents an adult (18+ years). Implements Comparable to compare dates.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method serves as a testbed for the Date class. It runs several test cases to validate the functionality of the Date class. Each test case prints the date, the test objective, the result of the isValid() method, and the expected outcome.
